subject: RE: Flock deployment map
body:
Good afternoon.  I have had several email and phone calls with Bret Jones, COE traffic engineering.  He will also be the person we work with once the map is finalized to confirm whether certain COE infrastructure can be used or need to use right-of-way depending on current equipment and accessibility.  

 

*	Locations not highlighted are COE owned properties 
*	Highlighted in Blue are ODOT owned properties managed by COE 
*	Highlighted in Red are COE owned properties managed by ODOT
*	Highlighted in Yellow are ODOT owned and maintained 

 

 

Private Property Permission needed for:

*	F#024 SR 99 @ Roosevelt Blvd NB - SR 99 is ODOT ROW 
*	F#025 SR 99 @ Barger Dr NB - SR 99 is ODOT ROW
*	F#038 Franklin Bl @ Walnut St WB - Franklin (SR99) ODOT 

Alternate Locations needed: ODOT ROW is too wide so private property not an option

*	F039 - SR 99 @ Jessen Dr SB
*	F#042 Randy Pape Beltline @ W 11th Ave NB

Other locations to confirm: 

*	F#019 Club Rd @ I105 SB
*	F#031 Club Rd @ I105 NB
*	F#044 River Rd @ Willow Springs Dr SB
*	F#045 Green Acres Rd @ N Delta Hwy EB
*	F#056 N Delta Hwy @ Randy Pape Beltline NB

 

 

Bret said he spoke too James Gamble, ODOT Region manager for this area.  He thinks it is possible we can add equipment to the Yellow/Blue highlighted locations but not sure on the process.  Red highlighted is COE right-a-way but to add to infrastructure would require ODOT permission.  Likely it will take language added to the IGA to add cameras to the existing infrastructure but didn�t think it would be anything more than a conversation to use flock pole to ODOT right-a-way.   

 

5 Springfield (Region 2) � Jim Gamble James.Gamble@odot.Oregon.gov James.Gamble@odot.Oregon.gov  

Phone #541-726-2541

I have a phone message to Jim Gamble and waiting for a call back.  I will update everyone once I hear.  

 

 

 

 

Jake Burke

Captain � Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5895 work

 

 



 

From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, March 4, 2025 4:28 PM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Flock deployment map

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Captain Burke and Detective DeWitt, 

 

My team just completed their review of the camera locations. Only a few comments... (Camera Map Link) https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c582255acf70c891dd59bf88dfdcfebbd38a0c7adc1c1276a68678dcb2bed7cfa690ac253b77c239e0158a239217c41a46f5 

 

Private Property Permission needed for:

*	F#024 SR 99 @ Roosevelt Blvd NB - SR 99 is ODOT ROW 
*	F#025 SR 99 @ Barger Dr NB - SR 99 is ODOT ROW
*	F#038 Franklin Bl @ Walnut St WB - Franklin (SR99) ODOT 

Alternate Locations needed: ODOT ROW is too wide so private property not an option

*	F039 - SR 99 @ Jessen Dr SB
*	F#042 Randy Pape Beltline @ W 11th Ave NB

I was hoping we'd be in the all clear but thankfully it's not too many that need to be revisited. I am available tomorrow or Thursday to hop on a Zoom and review together.

 

 

	
 

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfm1/108062/26/trans.png>  310-844-3659 call/text <tel:310-844-3659call/text>    <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 

 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/1XrlOmpdrQPY.png>
